Jose Luis tiene 31 años de edad, vive en el Distrito de Pucará en un sector llamado San Juan, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población es tranquila y se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, está ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Él brinda servicios de transporte por mototaxi, realizando esta actividad desde hace 5 años, adicionalmente se dedica a brindar servicios como obrero de construcción, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 800 nuevos soles para invertir en arreglos de su mototaxi y de esta manera asegurar el buen funcionamiento de su herramietna de trabajo, lo que va a permitir mantener y/o mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is 31 years old, lives in Pucará district, in the sector called San Juan, a community with a warm climate. Its population is quite and works in agriculture, trade and animal husbandry, and it is located in Jaén province which is part of Cajamarca region in the northern Peruvian mountains.

He offers motorcycle taxi transportation services, and has done this work for the past 5 years. In addition, he works offering his services as a construction worker. He has requested a loan of 800 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in repairs on his motorcycle taxi and in this way assure the good functioning of his work tool, which is going to allow him to maintain and/or improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in repairs on his vehicle, with which he will generate more income and be able to improve his quality of life.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 40 and she lives with her family in Ijevan city in the Tavush region. Aida has a higher pedagogical education and for many years she worked at the college and then at the school as a teacher of mathematics. Till now she has worked at her specialty, but she also has another occupation.  

With her husband, Aida established a small workshop where they produce bread. It is already four years they have worked night and day so they already have earned a good reputation in their city. They have workers but Aida and her husband also work there in order to have fresh and warm bread early in the morning, since their regular customers like to take it for breakfast.

Aida asks this loan since she wants to buy some new bread-baking equipment since she wants to start the production of cookies and some new types of breads.

loans.use: to buy some new bread baking equipment.

loans.name: Hakob

texts.en:
Hakob, 28, lives in the village of Pambak in the Lori region of Armenia. He lives with his parents and his young, pretty wife, who is pregnant. They will have their baby in September. 

Hakob’s wife, a nurse, is already on maternity leave. Hakob works as a guard at the local railway station. 

Hakob has already paid back one Kiva loan, for which he and his wife are greatly thankful. With that loan, Hakob bought a computer for his wife.

Hakob is now requesting a loan of 250,000 Armenian drams to decorate his baby’s room nicely and buy a crib for his sweetie.

loans.use: to decorate his baby’s room and buy a crib for his sweetie

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro de 80 años de edad,  no tuvo la oportunidad de ir a una escuela, en los tiempos que se creció difícilmente había escuelas en la zona, por lo que no le quedo de otra que trabajar en la agricultura. Se casó a la edad de los veinte y cinco años, a procreo dos  hijas con su pareja, su esposa es ama de casa, ella es la que se encarga de las labores del hogar, sus hijas ya son mayores de edad quienes viven aparte,  en casa solo vive la pareja.


Él es agricultor, tiene más de sesenta años de realizar la actividad, su padre desde pequeño lo indujo por el buen camino, haciendo de él una persona muy responsable, por la zona en la que vive no hay más actividades que den resultado también influye grandemente la parte económica. La parcela donde trabaja le queda de retirado a un kilómetro, el recorrido lo hace a pie, a pesar de edad su buen estado de salud es el que más bien tiene.  Cuando hace la parte más fuerte del trabajo es que paga quien le ayude a trabajar. El horario de trabajo es de las 6:00 am a 9:00 am.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para el pago del arrendamiento de la tierra donde trabaja y en la compra de semilla, abonos, pesticidas, herbicidas y pago de mano de obra y la otra parte del préstamo será invertida en la compra de un tratamiento médico para su esposa, quien está un poco mal de salud.

 La mejora que el préstamo ara es poder tener ya todo preparado para la siembre del cultivo del maíz, la necesidad satisfecha es el poder tener un capital de trabajo con el que empezará a trabajar y cómprale los medicamentos a su esposa.
	
Desea seguir primero Dios trabajando, ya que con esto mantiene sano su cuerpo y mente, espera apoyar siempre a su esposa mientras pueda hacerlo y seguir llevando los granos básicos a su hogar. Lo que saca de la cosecha los residuos del cultivo los vende y esto le abona para el pago del préstamo.
texts.en:
80-year old Pedro never had the chance to go to school. At the time he was growing up, there were no schools in the area so he had no choice but to start work in the fields. He married at the age of 25 and had two daughters. His wife is a housewife and looks after the home. His daughters are already grown and live separately. Only he and his wife live in their home.

Pedro has been a farmer for more than 60 years. As a young child his father set him on a good path so he became a very responsible person. In the local area there is no work other than farming that brings in an income. The land he farms is in an isolated area about a kilometre away; he goes there on foot.

In spite of his age Pedro is in good health, as good as he could hope for. When the work is particularly hard, he pays someone to help him. He works from 6am to 9am.

The loan he is seeking will be used to pay the rent on the land he farms as well as to buy seeds, manure, pesticide, herbicide and hire workers. He also plans to use part of the money to pay for medical treatment for his wife who is sick.

God willing he wishes to keep on working as this keeps his body and mind healthy. He also hopes to help his wife while he can and bring grains to their home from the harvest.  Anything left over he sells and uses the money to repay his loan.

loans.use: Pay rent for the land he farms, buy seeds, manure, pesticides, herbicides, hire workers, and pay for medical treatment for his wife

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam lives in the town of Sisian with her husband, an army officer. She has been involved in the fruit and vegetable trade for the last four years.

Mariam sells a great variety of vegetables (tomatoes, cucumbers, greens, cabbage and potatoes) and fruits (apples, peaches, plums, pears, strawberries, etc.). She buys her products from local wholesale markets. 

Mariam's husband helps her greatly in her business. Profits from her business allow Mariam to meet her family’s needs.

The requested loan of $3,000 (USD) is very important for Mariam to be able to purchase fruits and vegetables for her business.

loans.use: to pay for fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Diky

texts.en:
Diky lives in Cianjur, a small city situated at the foot of Mount Gede-Pangrango in West Java province. He is married and living with his wife and his 4-month-old son in the family home. 

To support family living, Diky runs a small stall that sells mobile phones, mobile phone accessories, and mobile phone airtime credits. He joined Ruma because he wanted to increase his income and gain insights from Ruma's business. He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business runs, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to do more transactions on weekends. In the photo, Diky is sitting in his small stall.

loans.use: To process more mobile airtime credit transactions on weekends.

loans.name: Artemio

texts.en:
Artemio is a merchant from Leyte, Philippines. Artemio has run his retail store business for more than 20 years now, and this is the source of his income.

Artemio's business was ruined when a typhoon hit the country several months ago. It was hard for Artemio to earn a living after the typhoon. As of now, he just rebuild his store and is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell in his store such as biscuits, bread, snack foods, noodles, rice, canned goods, soda and beverages, sugar, eggs, salt and seasonings, soap and toiletries. Through this, Artemio will be able to increase his stock thus attracting more buyers to his store. 

In the future, Artemio hopes to expand his business and make it a success.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in his store such as biscuits, bread, snack foods, noodles, rice, canned goods, soda and beverages, sugar, eggs, salt and seasonings, soap and toiletries

loans.name: Jose Wilder

texts.es:
José Wilder tiene 24 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y su hijo, él se dedica al cultivo de caña y destilación de aguardiente en el caserío de Cuchea, el cual se encuentra en el dsitrito de Callacyuc, región Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

José se dedica a la destilación de aguardiente, hace ya 10 años. Él solicita préstamo para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de aguardiente, ya que esto incrementará la molienda y con eso su producción de aguardiente, y de esta manera sus ingresos creceran, aumentarán sus ganancias y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Wilder is 24 years old and he lives with his partner and his son. He works growing sugar cane and distilling aguardiente [sugar cane alcohol] in the community of Cuchea, which is in the district of Callacyuc, the region of Cajamarca, in the northern highlands of Peru.

José has worked distilling aguardiente for 10 years now. He is requesting this loan to purchase raw material to make the aguardiente because it will increase his grinding, and therefore his aguardiente production as well. This way, his income will grow, his profits will increase and so will his quality of life.

loans.use: to increase his grinding, and therefore his aguardiente [sugar cane alcohol] production.

loans.name: Marías Bertha

texts.es:
La Señora. María forma parte hace un año y medio del grupo de crédito 10 de Agosto, vive en la parroquia Santa Ana, esta parroquia es de clima frió, tiene una hermosa vista de la ciudad de Cuenca y de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo varias actividades. Le gusta su grupo de crédito ya que estando aquí ha logrado crecer un poco más en su actividad económica, la misma que le permite salir adelante con su familia.
La Señora María tiene 33 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos de 10, 6 y 2 años, su primera hija trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, su segundo hijo estudia en una escuelita del sector, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus padres con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar.
Doña María se dedica a la cría de animales, tiene ganado y con la leche que obtiene realiza queso para la venta, también cría cerdos y borregos, la agricultura es para el consumo de su casa y la venta. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca lechera. Su sueño es de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
A year and a half ago, María joined part of the 10 de Agosto communal bank. She lives in the parish of Santa Ana. This parish is of cold climate, it has a beautiful view of the city of Cuenca and of nature. Its people work raising animals and at agriculture. Many work in the city, carrying out various activities. She likes her village bank; since being here, she has achieved growing a little more in her economic activity, this also allows her to get ahead with her family.

María is 33, a single mother of 3 children of 10, 6 and 2 years of age. Her first daughter works and she helps her economically. Her second son studies in a school of the sector. She doesn't have her own house because she lives in the house of her parents, with whom she shares the expenses of the home.

María works raising animals. She has cattle and with the milk that she obtains, she makes cheese for selling. She also raises pigs and sheep. The agriculture is for consumption of her home and for sale. She is going to invest the money of her loan in the purchase of a dairy cow. Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Diana Zobeyda

texts.es:
El bienestar y la salud de las personas siempre han sido de interés para Diana, razón por la que decidió estudiar Medicina. Cada mañana se levanta con mucho ánimo y entusiasmo para realizar lo que más le gusta, adquirir nuevos conocimientos, desea aprovechar la oportunidad de estudiar para poder servir al desarrollo del país. Tiene 19 años, está soltera y cursa tercer año de la carrera.  Sus padres han sido un pilar importante en su formación académica, le brinda el apoyo necesario para que cumpla sus metas y logré ser una profesional de éxito. 
Diana solicita el crédito para el pago de las mensualidades de su carrera, ya que le ha resultado difícil estar al día puesto que sus padres tienen algunos problemas económicos y lo que menos desea es perder un año de su carrera, razón principal por la que deposita su confianza en el financiamiento. Es una joven inteligente y emprendedora. Una de sus metas es seguir obteniendo buenas calificaciones, de manera que pueda culminar su carrera con honores, teniendo en mente la razón por la que lo hace, el bienestar de las personas.
texts.en:
People's well-being and health have always been an interest of Diana's, so she decided to study medicine. Every morning she gets up with a lot of energy and enthusiasm to do what she likes best, acquire new knowledge. She wants to take advantage of the opportunity to study to be able to help with her country's development. She is 19 years old, single, and is in her third year of her degree. Her parents have been an important pillar in her academic formation, they have offered her the support necessary to meet her goals and to become a successful professional.

Diana asks for a loan to pay the fees for her degree, since it has been difficult to stay current since her parents have some economic problems and what she least desires is to miss a year of her studies, which is the primary reason she puts her confidence in the loan. She is an intelligent and enterprising young woman. One of her goals is to continue getting good grades, so she can finish her degree with honors, having in mind the reason she does it, people's well-being.

loans.use: to pay the fees for her medicine degree.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, blocks, iron and sand.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José tiene 44 años de edad, él vive en casa propia de material rustico, vive solo no cuenta con ningun hijo a su cargo, cuenta con buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales. Él vive en la parte rural del distrito de Pucará, provicnia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza José es brindar servicios como maestro de obra en costruccio civil, realiza construcciones de casas entre otros. El destino del crédito será para ivertir en compra de madera para realizar construcciones, con ello le generará mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José is 44, he lives in his own house of rustic materials. He lives alone, he doesn't have any children in his care. He has good personal and work references. He lives in the rural part of the district of Pucará, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, northern sierra of Peru.

The activity that José carries out is to provide services as a foreman in civil construction. He carries out house construction, among others. The loan will be destined to invest in the purchase of wood to do construction. With this, he will generate more income and therefore be able to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of wood to do construction.

loans.name: Sri

texts.en:
Sri lives in Depok, a satellite city in southern Jakarta. She is single and lives with three people in the family home. 

She runs a small stall selling mobile phones, accessories and airtime and processing electronic bill payments. In the photo, Sri is in her small stall. 

Sri has joined Ruma because she wants to increase her income. She feels really excited about expanding her business of selling mobile phones, accessories and airtime and processing bill payments. 

As she runs her business, she hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to be able to process more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile airtime credit transactions on weekends

loans.name: Isrianto

texts.en:
Isrianto lives in Depok, a satellite city in southern Jakarta. He is married and lives with his wife and two children in the family home. He runs a small stall selling mobile phones, phone accessories and airtime credits. In the photo, Isrianto is in his small stall with his wife. 

Isrianto began working with Ruma a month ago because he wanted to increase his income. He feels really excited about expanding his business of selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments. As he runs his business, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile airtime credit transactions on weekends

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicándose al negocio de restaurante, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia continua elaborando desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como aceite entre otros.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en: Josefina continues to work in her restaurant. She has been doing this for years and things are going well for her thanks to the determination she brings to her work each day. She continues to make breakfast, lunch and dinner. She is a responsible and persevering person who wants to continue to work in this way to support her family. She is requesting the loan to buy supplies like oil amongst others. Josefina is grateful for the support offered her and promises to comply in a strict manner with the payments of her loan.

loans.use: to buy supplies like oil amongst others.

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.en:
Nargiza is a 46-year-old widowed woman who is alone with three children. Nargiza does everything to provide a good living condition and education for her children. Her daughter is a student and two sons don't have any activity yet. 

Nargiza is the only breadwinner in the family, working hard on family owned land where she seeds beans and uses it for local trading. As this activity is seasonal, Nargiza also started to work as a cooker's assistant, where she generates 200 GEL. In order to make her work more productive and ease financial difficulties, Nargiza requested a loan, which was approved with the joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. 

Nargiza decided to purchase stock of used clothing at wholesale prices and then sell them at good prices from her house. Her regular costumers will be neighbours and villagers.

She is a very enthusiastic and hardworking person with a great desire to ensure that her children receive a good education for progressing in life. This credit will be a great support for the family. Nargiza is thankful to Kiva Lenders for giving her a chance to increase her income

loans.use: to purchase stock of used clothing

loans.name: Teresa Jesus

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicándose a trabajar como docente del nivel primario, a la vez continua con su negocio de manualidades, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales didácticos.
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en: Teresa continues her work as a Primary school teacher and at the same time continues with her handicraft business. She has been in her business for a long time and things are going well for her thanks to the determination she brings each day to her work. She is a responsible and persevering person who wants to continue to work in this manner to support her family. Teresa is requesting a loan to buy educational materials. She is grateful for the loan and promises to comply in a strict manner in the payment of her installments.

loans.use: to buy teaching materials.

loans.name: María Nieves

texts.es:
La Señora. María forma parte del grupo de crédito 10 de Agosto desde hace algún tiempo, tiempo que le ha dado la oportunidad de estar con sus amigas y poder platicar de varios temas de su interés, así como también se beneficia de los créditos para el crecimiento de su negocio. Vive en la parroquia Santa Ana, esta parroquia es de clima frió, tiene una hermosa vista de la ciudad de Cuenca y de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo varias actividades.
La Señora María tiene 70 años de edad, es viuda pero en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos mayores de edad que están casados y viven independientes, la casa en la que vive es propia.
Doña María se dedica a la crianza de animales y a la agricultura, estas actividades le han permitido mejorar la estabilidad económica de su hogar y ser independiente.
Esta repitiendo  para comprar cerdos, pollos y alimento para animales. Su sueño es seguir ampliando su negocio por el bien de su familia.
texts.en:
María joined part of the 10 de Agosto village bank some time ago, time that has given her the opportunity to be with her friends and to be able to chat about various topics of her interest. She also benefits from the loans for the growth of her business.

She lives in the parish of Santa Ana. This parish is of cold climate, it has a beautiful view of the city of Cuenca and of nature. Its people work raising animals and at agriculture. Many labor in the city, carrying out various activities.

María is 70 years old. She is a widow but, in her conjugal union, she has conceived 6 children of age who are married and live independently. The house that she lives in is her own. María works raising animals and at agriculture. These activities have allowed her to improve the economic stability of her home and be independent.

She is repeating to buy pigs, chickens and animal feed. Her dream is to continue growing her business for the good of her family.

loans.use: to buy pigs, chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Tsoghik

texts.en:
Tsoghik lives with her husband and they run a farm. Their only son is a migrant worker in a neighbouring country.

Tsoghik and her husband keep cows, calves, hens and some sheep as well as cultivating wheat and potatoes. The milk that they gather, Tsoghik uses in cheese production and together with the harvest is sold in the market. 

For being able to increase family income, Tsoghik has applied for this loan. She plans to purchase grass as forage for the livestock. The loan will be a huge support for Tsooghik to feed their animals during coming seasons.

loans.use: to pay for grass as forage for their livestock

loans.name: Sabrina Liszeth

texts.es:
Sabrina es una persona muy emprendedora, tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera y vive en Ica junto a su familia.
Su mayor motivación en la vida son sus padres, es por ellos que lucha cada día para poder brindarles un mejor futuro. Por falta de recursos económicos en su hogar no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, sin embargo para apoyar a su familia consiguió un trabajo en una empresa prestigiosa y hoy le va muy bien porque trabaja mucho para poder obtener resultados favorables.
Sabrina quiere comprar una nueva cocina para su mamá porque la que tienen está un poco deteriorada y es peligrosa porque en ocasiones ha habido fuga de gas. Ella está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá cumplir esa meta, gracias a esto estará mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia y cuando se estabilice más en el trabajo podrá seguir una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Sabrina is a very enterprising person. She is 20 years old, single, and lives in Ica with her family. Her greatest motivation in life are her parents. It's because of them that she fights every day to be able to bring them a better future. Due to lack of economic resources in her home, she couldn't study a professional career. However, to support her family, she got work in a prestigious business and today it's going very well for her because she works a lot to be able to obtain favorable results.

Sabrina wants to buy a new stove for her mom, because the one they have is a little deteriorated and is dangerous because on occasions, there have been gas leaks. She is very thankful for the Kiva lenders for their support that they have provided. She will be able to fulfill this goal, thanks to this she will be improving the quality of life of her family and when she stabilizes herself more at work, she will be able to continue a university degree.

loans.use: to buy a stove for her house.

loans.name: Yanett Dionisia

texts.es:
La socia Yanett Dionisia continua con su negocio de venta de plata, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende pulseras, artes entre otros a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de aretes.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Yanett Dionisia continues with her business selling silver.  She has had this business for many years and it is going very well thanks to the determination she puts in every day.  She sells bracelets, earrings, and other items that her customers order.  She is a responsible and determined person.  She wants to continue working to continue supporting her family.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase earrings.  She is grateful for the support provided and promises to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase earrings.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more tools anda  generator.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an air-conditioner and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Jehison Erik

texts.es:
Jehison es un joven trabajador, es soltero, tiene 23 años de edad y vive en Ica junto a su familia. Gracias al apoyo de sus padres y a su esfuerzo está estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad en la Universidad y como para apoyar en algunos gastos también trabaja brindando servicio de mototaxi, le va muy bien porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante y es muy luchador, además que siempre trata con amabilidad a los clientes.
Jehison necesita realizar el mantenimiento de su mototaxi para  que no tenga inconvenientes al momento de trabajar, es por ello que se siente muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá cumplir con este objetivo y así mejorar sus ingresos y seguir apoyando a su familia. Gracias a ello seguirá esforzándose para más adelante abrir un pequeño negocio.
texts.en:
Jehison is a young hardworking man.  He is 23 years old, single, and lives in Ica with his family.  Thanks to the support of his parents and his efforts, he is studying for a degree in Accounting at the university.  In order to pay some expenses, he also works providing mototaxi service.  It is going well because he wants to get ahead and is a fighter.  He is also very friendly to his customers.  

Jehison needs to do maintenance on his mototaxi so he does not have problems while he's working.  He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because he will be able to achieve this objective with their support.  This will increase his profits and allow him to continue supporting his family.  He will continue making an effort so that he can later open a small business.

loans.use: to do mototaxi maintenance.

loans.name: Milenka Teresa

texts.es:
La socia sigue dedicándose a trabajar para una empresa privada, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a trabajar para dicha empresa la cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de bienes de consumo.
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member continues dedicating herself to work for a private business. The member is a responsible and earnest person. The member has been working for said business for a good time, which brings her economic and personal satisfaction, being that this is the way in which the member gets her family ahead.

The member is applying for the loan to purchase consumer goods. The member is thankful for the support that will be granted. Likewise, she commits herself to fulfilling the payment of her installments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase consumer goods.

loans.name: Libia

texts.es:
La socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de autopartes para carros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua vendiendo lo que son faros, aceites entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar faros entre otros.
La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Libia continues with her business selling auto parts.  She is a responsible and determined person.  She continues selling headlights, oil, and other items that her customers request.  This is the way she moves her family forward.

She is requesting this loan to purchase headlights and other spare parts.

She is grateful for the support provided and promises to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase headlights and other spare parts.

loans.name: María Dolores

texts.es:
La Señora María forma parte del grupo de crédito 10 de Agosto. Vive en la parroquia Santa Ana, esta parroquia es de clima frió, tiene una hermosa vista de la ciudad de Cuenca y de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo varias actividades.

La Señora María tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos, dos de sus hijos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente y cuatro estudian en un colegio del sector, su esposo labora en la construcción, la casa en la que viven es propia.
Doña María se dedica a la crianza de animales los mismos que los vende cuando tiene  alguna necesidad económica, también se dedica a la agricultura, estas actividades le dan la oportunidad de pasar el mayor tiempo en casa y a su vez ser independiente.

 Esta repitiendo el crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cuyes y materiales de construcción para el mejoramiento de su casa. Su grupo de crédito le gusta porque siempre sale de la rutina y tiene un espacio para estar con sus amigas y platicar de varios temas de su interés.
texts.en:
María makes up part of the 10 de Agosto village bank. She lives in the parish of Santa Ana. This parish is of cold climate, it has a beautiful view of the city of Cuenca and of nature. Its people work raising animals and at agriculture. Many work in the city, carrying out various activities.

María is 43, she is married and by the fruit of her conjugal union, she has conceived 6 children. Two of her children work and help her economically and four study in a school of the sector. Her husband works in construction, the house that they live in is their own. María works raising animals, which she sells when she has an economic necessity. She also works in agriculture. These activities give her the opportunity to pass more time at home and, at the same time, be independent.

She is repeating the loan and she is going to invest it in the purchase of chickens, guinea pigs and construction materials for improving her house. She likes her village bank because it always gets her out of her routine and she has a space to be with her friends and chat about various topics of her interest.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs and construction materials.

loans.name: Miriam Patricia

texts.es:
La Señora Miriam forma parte del grupo de crédito Mujeres con Decisión, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por sus hermosas iglesias y por los ríos que bañan esta ciudad, su gastronomía es muy variada y su gente es muy cordial y amable.
La Señora. Miriam tiene 35 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos niñas que son gemelas,  tienen 11 años y están estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus padres con quienes comparte los gastos.
Doña Miriam es enfermera y labora en turnos rotativos. También se va a dedicar a la venta de cosméticos para tener un ingreso extra.  El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos para emprender en el negocio ya que tiene muchos conocidos a quienes puede vender. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Miriam forms part of the Mujeres con Decisión [Women with Decision] village bank. She lives in the city of Cuenca. This city is known for its beautiful churches and for the rivers that spread over the city. Its cuisine is very varied and its people are very cordial and friendly.

Miriam is 35, a single mother of two daughters who are twins. They are 11 years old and are studying in a school of the city. She doesn't have her own house, therefore, she lives in the house of her parents, with whom she shares the expenses.

Miriam is a nurse and works in rotating shifts. She is also going to work selling cosmetics to have extra income. She is going to invest the money from her loan in the purchase of cosmetics to launch the business since she knows many people to whom she can sell. Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María tiene 69 años de edad, vive con su conyuge, en el caserio de Huayabas, distrito Querocotillo, provincia de Cutervo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú; no tiene hijos bajo su responsabilidad. L

María se dedica al comercio de ganado vacuno, hace 15 años. Ella desea invertir en compra de mayor número de ganado vacuno ya que posee conocimiento en este negocio, y al tener mayor número de animales tendrá mayor numero de clientes lo que aumentará su ingresos, mejorará sus ganancias y con ello también su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is 69 years old and lives with her spouse in the village of Huayabas, Querocotillo district, in the Province of Cutervo, Cajamarca Region in the North Andes of Peru. She has no children under her responsibility.

María has worked raising cattle for 15 years. She wants to invest in buying a greater number of cattle as she has experience in the field. The more cattle she has, the more clients she will have and her revenues will go up, increasing her profit. Doing this she can improve her quality of living.

loans.use: to invest in buying a greater number of cattle.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  Jean has been in this business for 2 years and earns additional income from livestock.

She is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

Jean has sustained her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She plans to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his daughter's education.

loans.name: Kariakoo Group

texts.en:
Jemima is a single woman in her late twenties.  She has been a food vendor for seven years and works from 7am to 2pm daily to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Jemima's 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loan to buy stock items for her food business and has successfully repaid her loan. She used the profit to take care of her needs and cover household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy cooking ingredients.  

She dreams of owning a Hotel.

Jamima will share this loan with her 8-member loan group "Kariakoo".  They hold each other accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: to buy  cooking ingredients.

loans.name: María Carmen

texts.es:
La Señora María es socia del grupo de crédito Mujeres con Decisión, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por sus hermosas iglesias y por sus ríos que bañan esta ciudad, su gastronomía es muy variada y su gente que es muy cordial y amable. Le gusta esta forma de créditos porque tiene muy buenas amigas con quienes comparte los buenos y malos momentos de su vida.
La Señora. María tiene 44 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 24, 19 y 13 años, sus dos primeros hijos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, su ultima hija estudia en un colegio de la ciudad, su esposo labora como latonero, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de su mamá con quien comparte los gastos. 
Doña María es toda una profesional en la rama de la costura, hace bordados en la ropa tradicional de la región, trabaja desde su casa todos los días. El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de telas y materiales de costura para sus obras. Su meta es agrandar  su negocio.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Mujeres con Decisión credit group.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is known for its beautiful churches and the rivers that bathe the city.  Its cuisine is varied and the people are very friendly and kind.  She likes this type of loan because she has very good friends with whom she can share the good and bad moments of life.

María is 44 years old, married, and has three children who are 24, 19, and 13 years old.  Her two older children work and help her financially.  Her younger daughter attends high school in the city.  Her husband works as a brass craftsman.  They do not have their own home and live with her mother, with whom they share costs.

María is a professional seamstress.  She does embroidery on the traditional clothing from the region.  She works from her home every day.  She will use this loan to purchase fabric and sewing materials for her work.  Her goal is to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and sewing materials.

loans.name: Rosa Yolanda

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 48 años de edad, vive con su conyuge, en casa propia, en una comunidad tranquila, donde se respira paz y armonía que esta ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Rosa se dedica a las actividad de cria y venta de animales, con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio, ella presta este servicio en el mismo distrito y sus alrededores; rosa solicita préstamo para la compra de animales y alimentos para estos, dicha inversión le servirá para poder aumentar sus venta y por ende sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosa is 48. She lives with her spouse, in her own house, in a tranquil community where one can breathe peace and harmony. It is located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, northern coast of Peru.

Rosa dedicates herself to the activity of raising and selling animals. With more than 3 years of experience in the business, she offers this service in the same district and its surroundings. Rosa is applying for this loan for the purchase of animals and feed for them. Said investment will serve her to be able to increase her sales and, therefore, her income.

loans.use: to purchase animals and feed for them.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a 63-year-old married woman with six children.

She earns a living growing rice in the Philippines.  Lydia has grown rice for 17 years and earns additional income in retail rice.

Lydia requests 30,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional fertilizer and other farm supplies.


She works tirelessly to attain of her dream which is to save money expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Ma. Charito

texts.en:
Ma. Charito is a 38-year-old married woman with four children.  Ma. Charito works very hard to provide for her 3 children that attend school.

She has run a retail charcoal business for 15 years and requests 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

In the future Ma. Charito would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Sylivia

texts.en:
Sylvia is a single mother with two children; both attend school.  She also takes care of older parents. 

She has sold used clothing for 3 years. She has applied for a loan of 400,000 UGX from MCDT-SACCO to buy bulk quantities of used clothing. She works in a market and sells on retail basis six days out of every week. 

Her major business challenges include weather conditions and customers who don't pay their bills. She wants to become a whole seller, buy a plot of land, and build a house.  She resides in a rented house and the family.

loans.use: to buy bulk quantities of  used clothing.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is a married woman with six children, five attend school.  She also cares for her sister.  She has had a business of selling green bananas for 7 years. 

She has applied for a loan of 400,000 UGX from MCDT - SACCO to buy bulk quantities of green bananas.  Her major business challenges include weather changes and increasing operational costs. 

She wishes to go to the villages for green bananas and to become a whole seller.   She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but not running water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy bunches of green bananas.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
El socio Alberto continua dedicándose al negocio de venta pollos, el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le  va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio cría a sus animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan en los distintos mercados de la ciudad, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de pollos.

 Alberto agradece a  KIVA por permitirle seguir trabajando y desarrollándose en su actividad económica.
Alberto pertenece al banco “Manos Juntas” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en:
Alberto, a member of the community bank, continues to work selling chickens.  He had been in this business for a long time and it is going well thanks to the determination that he applies to his business every day.  He raises small animals to sell them later to his clients from different markets in the city.  He wants to be able to continue working to support his family.  He is asking for a loan to buy chickens.

Alberto thanks Kiva for allowing him to continue working and developing his business.  He belongs to the "Manos Juntas" bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Elizabeth Francisca

texts.es:
La Señora. Elizabeth parte del grupo de crédito Mujeres con Decisión, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por sus hermosas iglesias y por los ríos que bañan esta ciudad, su gastronomía es muy variada y su gente es muy cordial y amable.
La Señora. Elizabeth tiene 37 años, es una mujer casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 15 y 14 años de edad que estudian en un colegio de la ciudad, su esposo es comerciante independiente de productos varios, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando. 
Doña Elizabeth es estilista, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años pero solo como empleada, trabaja de lunes a sábados. El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en el pago de las matriculas y útiles escolares de sus hijos para este nuevo año lectivo. Su meta es tener su propio salón de belleza.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is part of the Mujeres con Decisión [Women with Decision] village bank. She lives in the city of Cuenca. This city is known for its beautiful churches and for the rivers that spread over the city. Its cuisine is very varied and its people are very cordial and friendly.

Elizabeth is 37. She is a married woman and from the fruit of her conjugal union, she has conceived 2 children, 15 and 14 years old who study in a school of the city. Her husband is an independent merchant of various products. She doesn't have her own house, so she lives by renting.

Elizabeth is a stylist. She has been working at this activity for many years but only as an employee - she works from Monday to Saturday. She is going to invest the money from her loan in the payment of tuition and school supplies for her children for this new school year. Her dream is to have her own beauty salon.

loans.use: to pay tuition and to by school supplies.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is a 43-year-old married man, blessed with seven children aged between 18 and 1 year. He has been operating a motorbike transport service for the last five years and his business clientele has been growing with time. Every month he is able to make a profit of about KES 15,000 which is enough for him to cater to his family's needs.

He has applied for his third loan which he will use to buy another motorbike to be able to offer more of the needed service. He hopes to use the anticipated profits to pay his children's school fees as well as boost other projects he is planning for.

In the future, he would like to upgrade his family's living standard.

loans.use: To buy another motorbike

loans.name: Horlando

texts.es:
Horlando tiene 49 años de edad, es nacido en Caserio Laurel Distrito de Pimpingos, Radica en Distrito Santo Tomas hace 5 años, con hogar estable, vive en armonia con su conyuge y 5 menores hijos uno de 16, 12, 8, 4 y 2 años de edad, el mayor estudian en el Colegio Secundario, dos estudian en colegio primario del distrito de Santo Tomas y uno en inicial también en distrito Santo Tomas. Horlando cuenta con casa propia de material rustico y vivienda en contrucción de material noble, la cual queda en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

Horlando esta dedicado a elaboración de fundas y monturas de cuero y otros productos, cuenta con amplia experiencia en el rubro(22 años), es el único en el Distrito con esta actividad, adicionalmente cultiva café en caserio Laurel distrito de Pimpingos variedad catimor, su plantación tiene tres años de edad primer año de producción, se lleva bien con los miembros de Distrito, siendo colaborador y responsable en los actos requeridos, con buenas referencias personales y comerciales en la zona, él cuenta con clientes fijos que compran sus productos, él trabaja con pedidos que lo llevan a Chota y a la selva. El destino del crédito será para activio fijo construcción de vivienda de material noble, con ello hará acabados de local para negocio y así tener local apropiado para ofrecer producto en mayores cantidades, lo que aumentará sus ingresos y por ende mejorará sus ganancias y si calidad de vida y la toda su familia.
texts.en:
Horlando is 49 years old. He was born in the Caserio Laurel, district of Pimpingos. He has lived in the district of Santo Tomas for 5 years in a stable home. He lives in harmony with his spouse and 5 minor children, aged 16,12, 8, 4 and  2. The oldest is in high school, two are in primary in the district of Santo Tomas, and one is in pre-school, also in the district of Santo Tomas. Horlando owns his own home made from rustic materials in the province of Cutervo, Cajamarca region, northern sierra of  Peru.

Horlando makes leather bags and saddles. He has a lot of experience in this type of work (22 years). He is the only one in the district who does this activity. In addition, he grows catimor coffee in caserio Laurel, district of Pimpingos. His plantation is three years old and in the first year of production. He gets along well with the district members because he is cooperative and responsible with the things that need to be done. He has good personal and work references in the area. He has regular customers who buy his products. He works with orders that take him to Chota and the jungle. The loan will be used for fixed assets. He will build a house out of high quality materials. He will also do the finishings on his locale so it will be appropriate for offering larger quantities of products. This will increase his income and thus improve his and his whole family's quality of life.

loans.use: for fixed assets. He will build a house from high quality materials and do the finishings on his business local so it will be appropriate for offering product.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar es un joven que lucha por salir adelante, su mama es quien lo está ayudando a poder estudiar y a seguir sus metas.
Comenta que quiere superar sus obstáculos y ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de sus estudios. Está siguiendo la carrera de técnico agropecuario y se está dedicando bastante.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad y seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Edgar is a youngster who fights to get ahead. His mom is the one who is supporting him to study and reach his goals.

He says he wants to overcome obstacles and help his loved ones through his education. He is pursuing a degree to become an agricultural technician and putting in a lot of effort.

He asks for this loan to be able to pay the tuition and continue studying.

loans.use: pay college tuition and fees.

loans.name: Sebelio

texts.es:
Sebelio viene de una familia muy numerosa, gracias a sus padres inició su carrera, y comenta que su inspiración es terminar su licenciatura y seguir estudiando para algún día ser Ingeniero.
Está estudiando la carrera de licenciatura en electricidad, ya que por medio de ello podrá realizarse como persona y profesional.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad.
texts.en:
Sebelio comes from a large family.  He started his course of study thanks to his parents, and he says that he aspires to finish his degree and continue studying to become an engineer some day.  He is studying towards getting a degree in electrical engineering.

He is asking for this loan to invest it in his education and pay his university fees.

loans.use: to pay university fees

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.es:
Cynthia está en el primer curso de la carrera de contador público, comenta que vive con sus abuelos y hermanas. 
Al recibirse espera ser una eficiente trabajadora, tener su propia oficina de estudios contables, y poder dar un buen servicio a las personas que acudan a ella.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, y así seguir luchando.
texts.en: Cynthia in in the first year of her accounting major. She says she lives with her grandparents and siblings. When she graduates she hopes to be an efficient worker and have her own accounting office so she can give a good service to people who come to her. She is asking fort his loan to be able to pay for college tuition so she can keep fighting.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa es estudiante de la carrera de licenciatura en ciencias ambientales le faltan dos materias para terminar su carrera que con tanto sacrificio estudió.
Ella es madre soltera, tiene un hijo por el que está luchando día a día de manera incansable, para poder darle todo lo que ella no tuvo y que no pase por necesidades como las que ella paso.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar las cuotas de su carrera y seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Rosa is an environmental sciences student. She still has two more subjects to finish her major that she has sacrificed so much to study. She is a single mother of a son and that is why she fights day to day tirelessly to be able to give him everything she didn't have so he will lack for nothing like she did. She is asking for this loan to be able to invest in paying tuition and continuing her education.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Nancy Violeta

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicándose al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia continua vendiendo arroz, azúcar entre otros a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera continuar apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche entre otros.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member continues dedicating herself to the grocery store business. The member has been dedicating herself to this business for years, which is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts forth to her business every day. The member continues selling rice, sugar, among others to all of her customers who order from her. The member is a responsible and eager person. The member wishes to be able to continue working to continue, in this manner, supporting her family.

The member is applying for the loan to buy milk, among other things. The member is thankful for the support to be granted and, moreover, commits herself to fulfilling the payment of her installments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy milk, among others.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
La socia Angelica pertenece al banco “Manos Juntas” de la ciudad del Cusco.
 La socia continúa  dedicándose al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia vende lo que son arroz, azúcar entre otros, la socia a la vez continúa vendiendo mixtura, papel picado entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de leche entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: The member, Angelica, belongs to the bank "Hands Together" in the city of Cusco. The member continues to make a living in the grocery store business. The member is a responsible and honest person. She sells rice and sugar among other things while continuing to sell party favors and confetti among other things. The member wants to be able to continue working in this manner to continue supporting her family. The member is requesting a loan to buy milk among other things. She is grateful for the granted loan and promises to fulfill her loan fee obligations.

loans.use: to purchase milk among other things

loans.name: Nanette

texts.en:
As a married parent of one children, Nanette works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from charcoal vending.  Nanette is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like flour, cooking oil, noodles, etc for her food vending business.

Nanette has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like flour, cooking oil, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose al turismo,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa,la socia continua vendiendo paquetes turisticos para los distintos clientes que le solicitan,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de boletos entre otros.
La socia Elizabeth se siente agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse y desarrollarse en su actividad comercial.
texts.en: The member continues to make a living in tourism. She is a responsible and honest person and continues to sell tourist package for the different clients requesting her. The member wants to be able to continue working in this manner to continue supporting her family. The member is requesting a loan to buy tickets among other things. The member, Elizabeth, is grateful for Kiva for allowing her to maintain and develop her commercial business.

loans.use: to buy tickets among other things

loans.name: Zarik

texts.en: Zarik lives in Agarak town with her husband and son. She started her business in 2007. She owns a little shop where she sells different types of designing products, accessories, and flowers. She loves her work and works hard to earn a high income. Due to her kind attitude towards people, she has managed to gain many loyal customers. Now she wants to enlarge her business and increase sales at the shop. She has applied for this loan to purchase children's toys, gifts, wreaths, and flowers for the shop. The loan of 3,000 USD is very important for Zarik to enlarge her shop and make it more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase children's toys, gifts, wreaths, and flowers for the shop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a generator and  a sewing machine.

loans.name: San Hilario Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SAN HILARIO”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Yonny tiene 31 años de edad, 01 hijo y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia cría a sus animales para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes.
Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de productos lácteos, venta de ropa, farmacia, trabajadores independientes, docentes, brindando el servicio de taxi.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
Las socias que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The members belong to the San Hilario Communal Bank.  This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. 

The member, Yonny, is 31 years old with one child, and she lives with her partner.  She alternates her daily activities with the business of raising small animals, such as guinea pigs. She has had her business for a long time and it is going well for her, thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day.  She raises her animals in order to sell them later to her customers, who request them. 

She is a responsible and diligent person; and this is the way that she provides for her family.  She is requesting a loan for the purchase of guinea pigs.

The other members devote themselves to businesses such as the sale of dairy products, clothing sales, a pharmacy, working independently, teaching, and providing taxi service. 

The member thanks those who are part this dream through this loan; and she promises to make her payments on time. The members in the attached photos requested permission to arrive late to the meeting because of work.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells maize. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are individuals. 

Josephine describes her biggest business challenge to be financial problems. She will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy more stock of maize. Her business goal is to have more businesses within five years. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock of maize

loans.name: Rima

texts.en:
Rima is involved in agriculture. She is raising seven mother pigs. Rima lives with her parents, retired grandparents, and brother. Rima's family also owns two greenhouses where they grow roses. One of those greenhouses is too old and needs to be renovated. Now, to fix that problem, Rima is asking for this loan of USD 2000. She will use the loan to purchase  fertilizer, polyethylene covering for the greenhouse and materials for renovation of the greenhouse. This will greatly help Rima to organize her work efficiently and she will be very grateful for lenders' support.

 As this is Rima's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who did not have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, polyethylene covering for the greenhouse, and materials for renovation of the greenhouse

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 53 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Nida has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from fishing.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc

loans.name: Tiessiri 3 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe Tiessiri 3 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 37 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à N’tiesso, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur Troisième prêt avec l’institution., les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés .
La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide avec Wassa, arrêtée au bout à  droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour et de sarclage pour entretenir  1  hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Koutiala, après la récolte, à une clientèle mixte.
 Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 175 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Tiessiri 3 group are married women, who average 37 years of age with four children each; they all live in traditional families in N'tiesso, one of the villages in Koutiala in Mali's third administrative region. They collaborate with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, so that they can run their farming activities smoothly during the winter season. They are on their third loan with the institution and the previous loans have been repaid in full.

Wassa, who is standing at the end on the right of the photo, grows groundnut. With her loan, she is planning to buy inputs, seeds and farming materials, as well as to pay for labor to farm and hoe a hectare of land. Once harvested, the produce will be sold in Koutiala to a mixed customer base. She is expecting to make an average profit of 175,000FCFA at the end of the season. This profit will allow her to repay her loan and also help out her husband with the daily outgoings.

loans.use: to pay for labor and hoeing, as well as to buy seeds, inputs and farming equipment;

loans.name: Tiessiri 4 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe Tiessiri 4 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 40 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à N’tiesso, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage.

La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide avec Mamou Salifou, assise 2ème de gauche à  droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour et de sarclage pour entretenir  1  hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Koutiala, après la récolte, à une clientèle mixte.
 Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 195 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.

Mamou Salifou, who is sitting second from the left in the photo, grows groundnut. With her loan, she is planning to buy inputs, seeds and farming materials, as well as to pay for labor to farm and hoe a hectare of land. Once harvested, the produce will be sold in Koutiala to a mixed customer base. She is expecting to make an average profit of 195,000FCFA at the end of the season. This profit will allow her to repay her loan and also help out her husband with the daily outgoings.

loans.use: to pay for labor and hoeing, as well as to buy seeds, inputs and farming materials.

loans.name: Ousseni

texts.fr:
Mr  OUSSENI est marié et père de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 05ans et le moins âgé a 02ans. Personne ne va  à l’école. Il a 03personnes en charge.
Mr vend des habits prêt à porter et des chaussures pour hommes et dames depuis 05ans. Il s’approvisionne à Lomé.
Il veut s’acheter 20jeans, 30chaussures et 30robes.
Avec ses bénéfices, il veut réinvestir dans son activité. Il ambitionne s’acheter un terrain (parcelle).
texts.en: Ousseni is married and father to two children. The eldest is five years old and the youngest two; neither of them go to school. He has three dependants. He has been selling mens' and womens' ready-to-wear clothing and shoes for the past five years, and he gets his supplies in Lomé. He would like to reinvest his profits in his business and his ambition is to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy 20 pairs of jeans, 30 pairs of shoes and 30 dresses.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: for the purchase of used jackets among other things

loans.name: Tiessiri 5 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe Tiessiri 5 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à N’tiesso, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur Troisième prêt avec l’institution., les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés .
La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide avec Awa, assise 2ème de droite à gauche sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour et de sarclage pour entretenir  1  hectare.

 Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 175 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.

The ten members of the Tiessiri 5 group are married women, who average 39 years of age with five children each; they all live in traditional families in N'tiesso, one of the villages in Koutiala in Mali's third administrative region. They collaborate with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, so that they can run their farming activities smoothly during the winter season. They are on their third loan with the institution and the previous loans have been repaid in full.

Awa, who is sitting second from the right in of the photo, grows groundnut. With her loan, she is planning to buy inputs, seeds and farming materials, as well as to pay for labor to farm and hoe a hectare of land. Once harvested, the produce will be sold in Koutiala to a mixed customer base. She is expecting to make an average profit of 175,000FCFA at the end of the season. This profit will allow her to repay her loan and also help out her husband with the daily outgoings.

loans.use: to pay for labor and hoeing, as well as to buy seeds, inputs and farming equipment.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en: Miriam is a married woman. She has one child. She describes herself as determined. She operates a retail business where she sells cosmetics, clothes, and other items. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located in a good area, and her customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge as a lack of sufficient capital. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to increase her stock of cosmetics, clothes, and other items. Her business goal is to become prosperous within five years. This is her first loan from SMEP Microfinance Bank. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

loans.use: buy increase her stock of cosmetics, clothes, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy electric scissors and an air-conditioner for her business.

loans.name: Rizza

texts.en: Rizza is 40 years old, married, and has two children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and applied for a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, including shampoo and groceries. Rizza has been in this business for five years. In the future, Rizza would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, including like shampoo and groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 30 sachets of water and two sacks of sugar for juice.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en: As a married parent of six children, Norma works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from buying and selling ready-to-wear clothing. Norma is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy additional materials for maintenance on the boat she uses in her fishing business. Norma has been sustaining her business activities with her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for the maintenance of her fishing boat.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina works hard to support her family.  She is married and is a dry fish vendor in the Philippines who has been in business for 20 years..

Rufina requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to purchase more dried fish to sell.

She would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Maricela

texts.es:
Muchos nicaragüenses migran a Costa Rica para encontrar una mejor oportunidad laboral, Maricela, fue una de esas personas que decidió dejar por un tiempo su país natal para poder ahorrar y regresar a Nicaragua. Tras unos meses de arduo trabajo, consiguió el dinero suficiente para regresar y establecer su propia pulpería en un lugar donde nadie más tenía. Ahora, su pulpería y única fuente de ingresos para su familia, tiene dos años de haberse inaugurado y sigue creciendo con pasos seguros. 
A sus 34 años de edad, es madre de un pequeño de seis años, quien a diario va al colegio, pues para ella significa mucho su crecimiento profesional, ya que ella solo llegó hasta segundo año de secundaria. Por esta y muchas otras razones, quiere seguir trabajando fuerte, por lo que quiere invertir en su negocio, mediante un préstamo que le permitirá comprar arroz, azúcar, frijoles, gaseosas, entre otros productos para tener mayor variedad en su local y así tener satisfechos a sus clientes. Entre sus planes está ampliar el negocio, introducir otras marcar y productos.
texts.en:
Many Nicaraguans migrate to Costa Rica to find better work opportunities.  Maricela is one such person who decided to leave her native country for a while to save money and then return to Nicaragua.  Through several months of hard work, she was able to put together enough money to return and establish her own small grocery store in a place where nobody else had one.  Now, her grocery store, the sole source of income for her family, has been running for two years and continues to grow in strides.

At 34 years old, she is the mother of a 6-year-old child who goes to school every day.  Therefore, his professional growth means a lot to her, since she was only able to study through the second grade of high school.  For this and many other reasons, she wants to continue working hard and invest in her business by taking out a loan that will allow her to buy rice, sugar, beans, and soft drinks, among other products, so that she can offer more variety in her store and have more satisfied clients.  Her plans are to expand her business and introduce other brands and products, among other things.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, and soft drinks, among other products

loans.name: Jhorlan Steven

texts.es:
Jhorlan es un joven con gran experiencia en la preparación de productos de panadería como buñuelos, pasteles, roscones, entre otros; a sus escasos 18 años de edad sabe preparar todo este tipo de alimentos gracias a las enseñanzas de su padre quien lo educo en esta materia.

El trabaja en distintas actividades para colaborar con los gastos de su hogar, pero ha decidido iniciar con un negocio de venta de productos de panadería en su propia casa con el afán de cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y en un futuro generar empleos.

Es así como solicita un préstamo que invertirá en la compra algunos equipos como hornos, ollas y utensilios de cosida, adicionalmente requiere la compra de materia prima como harina, azúcar, levadura, entre otros.

Con estos elementos podrá iniciar con su negocio y podrá ayudar a sus padres con la manutención de su hogar, haciendo que su vida sea mucho más productiva y mejor.
texts.en:
Jhorlan is a young man who has a great deal of experience in preparing baked goods such as donuts, pastries, Epiphany cakes, and other items. Being only 18 years old, he knows how to prepare all types of foods thanks to the lessons he learned from his father, who taught him this trade.

Jhorlan works in various activities in order to help with the household expenses, but he decided to start a business of selling baked goods from home with the ambition of fulfilling his dream of becoming independent and creating jobs in the future.

He is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of some equipment such as ovens, pans, and cooking utensils. In addition, he needs to buy ingredients such as flour, sugar, yeast, and other items. With these components, Jhorlan will be able to start his business and help his parents with maintaining their home. This will also help him make a better and more productive life for himself.

loans.use: to buy ovens, pans, cooking utensils, and ingredients for his business.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a married man who has seven children. 

He operates a retail business selling tailors t-shirts. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. His business is located in a populated area and his primary customers are institutions. 

Joseph says his biggest business challenges are a lack of capital and machines.  

He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy tailoring machine.  His business goal is to expand within five years. 

This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy a tailoring machine.

loans.name: Moline

texts.en:
Moline is a married woman. She has five children. She describes herself to be jovial. She operates a retail business where she sells drinks. She has been involved in this business for eight years. Her business is located in a marketable area. 

Moline describes her biggest business challenge to be seasonal changes. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of drinks. Her business goal is to have a bigger business within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of drinks

loans.name: William

texts.en: William is a male Kiva borrower. He has two children who are ages three and seven years. He operates a retail business where he sells shoes. He has been involved in this business for five years. His business is located in a busy area. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of finances. He will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy more stocks of shoes. His business goal is to have a supply firm within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will have a stable life. He will use the anticipated profits to pay his bills.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of shoes

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Concepcion is a 57 year old and married with seven children.  Three of them attend school.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Concepcion is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farming supplies.

Concepcion has been farming rice for three years and also earns income by working at a general store.

She works tirelessly to attain her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farming supplies.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 57 years old who has five children.  She is married and has children who attend school.

Delia is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farming supplies.

Delia has been farming vegetables for three years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Delia would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farming supplies.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en: Emelia is 40 years old, married, and has two children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Emelia is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional farming supplies. Emelia has been farming rice for three years and also earns additional income from a general store. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies

loans.name: Zahida
